thread.title: Kellyanne Conway got pulled off the air for a week by the White House
thread.title_full: Kellyanne Conway got pulled off the air for a week by the White House

author: Callum Borchers
title: Kellyanne Conway got pulled off the air for a week by the White House
text:
Kellyanne Conway got pulled off the air for a week by the White House Kellyanne Conway Pablo Martinez Monsivais / AP 
Counselor to the President Kellyanne Conway arrives before President Donald Trump speaks at a news conference, Thursday, Feb. 16, 2017, in the East Room of the White House in Washington. 
Counselor to the President Kellyanne Conway arrives before President Donald Trump speaks at a news conference, Thursday, Feb. 16, 2017, in the East Room of the White House in Washington. (Pablo Martinez Monsivais / AP) Callum Borchers Washington Post 
If it feels like you haven't seen Kellyanne Conway on TV in a while, you are not imagining things. The counselor to President Donald Trump , one of the new administration's most visible faces, was pulled off the air by the White House, CNN's Dylan Byers reported Wednesday afternoon. 
Byers added in a tweet that Conway's hiatus was temporary. 
"Kellyanne Conway now tells me she'll be going on Fox News tonight..." 
It has been more than a week since Conway appeared on television - an eternity, by her standard. The White House continued to trot her out after she coined the phrase "alternative facts," cited a "Bowling Green massacre" that never happened and promoted Ivanka Trump's products on Fox News, but apparently Trump could not abide statements that undermined the administration's official message.
